summary: Exchanges all Imperial troops armour, weapon and equipment with authentic Roman-era armours, weapons and equipment.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

Converts the Imperials into Romans! Exchanges armour, weapons, shields and renames the soldiers to their proper names such as Legionnaire, Prefect, Praetorian.
[b]
[/b]This is a complete re-placer, it changes NPCs and leveled lists as well as the armour forms. As such it will not be compatible with any mods that touches the same files. It also adds in unique armour for Legate's, officers, generals & the Penitus.

Complete list of armors:
Arcani,
Light Legionnaire,
Heavy Legionnaire,
Centurion,
Legate,
Praetorian,
Prefect,
Tullius.

As this is the first release, please let me know if I've missed anything or if you have any suggestions.

I am currently working on meshes to support [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url].


[b]- Coming Updates -[/b]
[b]
[/b]N/A.[b]

- Requirements -[/b]

None.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]
[/url]
[b]- Installation -[/b]

1) Unpack the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Activate the .esp file in your load-order.
2) Download first update (1.1 - missing meshes) and unpack the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite when prompted.
3) Download the fourth update (1.4) and unpack the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite when promted.


If after update certain characters still wear arcani/wizard gear instead of their proper light armour do the following:
1) Bring up console when near the character.
2) Select the character by clicking on them.
3) Type "disable", press Enter.
4) Type "enable", press Enter.

If this fails, exchange "disable" with "resurrect".

For [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37216/?]Civil War Overhaul[/url] file:
1) Install CWO.
2) Unpack the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Activate the .esp file in your load-order.
3) Download first update (1.1 - missing meshes) and unpack the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite when prompted.
4) Download the fourth update for CWO (1.4 CWO) and unpack the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite when promted.

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim\Data directory.
1) DV_Roman_Conversion.esp
2) DV_Roman_Conversion.bsa
3) DV_Roman_Conversion.bsl

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.4 - Fixed the last issues, updated both CWO and non-CWO files.
1.3 - Fixes one armour which had the wrong biped slots set in the ESP leading to partly invisible arms.
1.2 - Fixes one armour which was set to show the first-person mesh on females in third person, effectively making the armour invisible.
1.1 - Fixes one outfit list containing the wrong armor (see Battleborn), changes a couple shield meshes for less clipping. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37216/?]Civil War Overhaul[/url] file added.
1.0 - Initial release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks toÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/714867]Jedo_Dre[/url] who created all the meshes and textures!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
Any changes done to this file requires permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/714867]Jedo_Dre[/url] in accordance to permissions listed under [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era[/url].
